mapper.select: SELECT test.test_no testNo , test.teacher_no teacherNo , test.test_title testTitle , test.test_date testDate , teacher.teacher_name teacherName , question.question_no questionNo , question.question_idx questionIdx , question.question_title questionTitle , example.example_no exampleNo , example.example_idx exampleIdx , example.example_title exampleTitle , example.example_ox exampleOx FROM test INNER JOIN teacher ON test.teacher_no = teacher.teacher_no INNER JOIN question ON test.test_no = question.test_no INNER JOIN example ON question.question_no = example.question_no WHERE test.test_no = #{testNo} ORDER BY question.question_idx, example.example_idx
